== TSIM ==

 # Install the last version of [http://www.gaisler.com/cms/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=157&Itemid=105 TSIM2 LEON3 Evaluation]
 # tsim-leon3 -fast_uart -gdb embox
 # Connect to gdb server
   * if use eclipse see details [InstallToolchainEclipseDebug here]
   * for console debugging you should use command 
      {{{
            > sparc-elf-gdb embox
            (gdb) target remote :1234
            (gdb) c
      }}}
